name: KE-22
description:
A project made for the Metroidvania Month game jam. 
Team: 
Cat Ater (Grinless) (Programming/Design/Art), 
Jaime Shirazi (Audio/Programming),
thunder_clud (Art),
Animating Dragon (Art).

Controls: 
WD/Left/Right Arrows - Movement.
Space - Jump. 
Shoot- Shift + direction.
Interaction - E.
